description.raw:
This patch offers fixes for issues #479, #480.

Issue #480 was related to a strange behavior when attempting to verify roll without slip in a diagonal direction relative to the world XY axes. Test cases were added to SpawnDropCoGOffset in physics.cc that would pass in ODE but fail in Bullet. Changing a solver parameter in BulletPhysics enabled 2 friction directions and resolved the issue.

While modifying SpawnDropCoGOffset, failures to the JointDampingTest were observed. By setting the random seed at the beginning of the test, it now passes. Some changes to the underlying PhysicsEngine class were required to properly pass `math::Rand::GetSeed()` to the derived classes.
description.html:
This patch offers fixes for issues #479, #480.

Issue #480 was related to a strange behavior when attempting to verify roll without slip in a diagonal direction relative to the world XY axes. Test cases were added to SpawnDropCoGOffset in physics.cc that would pass in ODE but fail in Bullet. Changing a solver parameter in BulletPhysics enabled 2 friction directions and resolved the issue.

While modifying SpawnDropCoGOffset, failures to the JointDampingTest were observed. By setting the random seed at the beginning of the test, it now passes. Some changes to the underlying PhysicsEngine class were required to properly pass math::Rand::GetSeed() to the derived classes.

title.raw: Bullet: enable multiple friction directions, fix brittle JointDamping test (fix #479, #480)
title.html: Bullet: enable multiple friction directions, fix brittle JointDamping test (fix #479, #480)
